evidence.claim: Fusion Marketplace utilizes AWS for their cloud infrastructure.
The platform is compliant with HIPAA regulations, ensuring the protection of health information.
Fusion Marketplace supports FHIR for health data interoperability.
X12 EDI transactions are part of the messaging capabilities offered by Fusion Marketplace.
Snowflake is used for data warehousing within Fusion Marketplace's analytics infrastructure.

icp.icp_reason: Company engages in healthcare data exchange and has relevant tech stack.
